{{html: 
<div class="section" id="ruby-s3-examples">
<span id="ruby"></span><h1>Ruby S3 Examples<a class="headerlink" href="#ruby-s3-examples" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h1>
<div class="section" id="creating-a-connection">
<h2>Creating a Connection<a class="headerlink" href="#creating-a-connection" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>This creates a connection so that you can interact with the server.</p>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">Base</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">establish_connection!</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="ss">:server</span>            <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="s1">'objects.dreamhost.com'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="ss">:use_ssl</span>           <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="kp">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="ss">:access_key_id</span>     <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="s1">'my-access-key'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="ss">:secret_access_key</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="s1">'my-secret-key'</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="listing-owned-buckets">
<h2>Listing Owned Buckets<a class="headerlink" href="#listing-owned-buckets" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>This gets a list of <a class="reference external" href="http://amazon.rubyforge.org/doc/">AWS::S3::Bucket</a> objects that you own.
This also prints out the bucket name and creation date of each bucket.</p>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">Service</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">buckets</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">each</span> <span class="k">do</span> <span class="o">|</span><span class="n">bucket</span><span class="o">|</span>
        <span class="nb">puts</span> <span class="s2">"</span><span class="si">#{</span><span class="n">bucket</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="se">\t</span><span class="si">#{</span><span class="n">bucket</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">creation_date</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s2">"</span>
<span class="k">end</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The output will look something like this:</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>mahbuckat1   2011-04-21T18:05:39.000Z
mahbuckat2   2011-04-21T18:05:48.000Z
mahbuckat3   2011-04-21T18:07:18.000Z</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="creating-a-bucket">
<h2>Creating a Bucket<a class="headerlink" href="#creating-a-bucket" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>This creates a new bucket called <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">my-new-bucket</span></tt></p>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">Bucket</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">create</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="listing-a-bucket-s-content">
<h2>Listing a Bucket&#8217;s Content<a class="headerlink" href="#listing-a-bucket-s-content" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>This gets a list of hashes with the contents of each object
This also prints out each object&#8217;s name, the file size, and last
modified date.</p>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">new_bucket</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">Bucket</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">new_bucket</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">each</span> <span class="k">do</span> <span class="o">|</span><span class="n">object</span><span class="o">|</span>
        <span class="nb">puts</span> <span class="s2">"</span><span class="si">#{</span><span class="n">object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">key</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="se">\t</span><span class="si">#{</span><span class="n">object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">about</span><span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">'content-length'</span><span class="o">]</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="se">\t</span><span class="si">#{</span><span class="n">object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">about</span><span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">'last-modified'</span><span class="o">]</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s2">"</span>
<span class="k">end</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The output will look something like this if the bucket has some files:</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>myphoto1.jpg 251262  2011-08-08T21:35:48.000Z
myphoto2.jpg 262518  2011-08-08T21:38:01.000Z</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="deleting-a-bucket">
<h2>Deleting a Bucket<a class="headerlink" href="#deleting-a-bucket" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<div class="admonition note">
<p class="first admonition-title">Note</p>
<p class="last">The Bucket must be empty! Otherwise it won&#8217;t work!</p>
</div>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">Bucket</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">delete</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="forced-delete-for-non-empty-buckets">
<h2>Forced Delete for Non-empty Buckets<a class="headerlink" href="#forced-delete-for-non-empty-buckets" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">Bucket</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">delete</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="ss">:force</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="kp">true</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="creating-an-object">
<h2>Creating an Object<a class="headerlink" href="#creating-an-object" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>This creates a file <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">hello.txt</span></tt> with the string <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">"Hello</span> <span class="pre">World!"</span></tt></p>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">S3Object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">store</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="s1">'hello.txt'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s1">'Hello World!'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="ss">:content_type</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="s1">'text/plain'</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="change-an-object-s-acl">
<h2>Change an Object&#8217;s ACL<a class="headerlink" href="#change-an-object-s-acl" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>This makes the object <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">hello.txt</span></tt> to be publicly readable, and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">secret_plans.txt</span></tt>
to be private.</p>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">policy</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">S3Object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">acl</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'hello.txt'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">policy</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grants</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">[</span> <span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="ss">ACL</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:Grant</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grant</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="ss">:public_read</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">]</span>
<span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">S3Object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">acl</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'hello.txt'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">policy</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">policy</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">S3Object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">acl</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'secret_plans.txt'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">policy</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grants</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">[]</span>
<span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">S3Object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">acl</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'secret_plans.txt'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">policy</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="download-an-object-to-a-file">
<h2>Download an Object (to a file)<a class="headerlink" href="#download-an-object-to-a-file" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>This downloads the object <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">poetry.pdf</span></tt> and saves it in
<tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">/home/larry/documents/</span></tt></p>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'/home/larry/documents/poetry.pdf'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'w'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">do</span> <span class="o">|</span><span class="n">file</span><span class="o">|</span>
        <span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">S3Object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">stream</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'poetry.pdf'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">do</span> <span class="o">|</span><span class="n">chunk</span><span class="o">|</span>
                <span class="n">file</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">write</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">chunk</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">end</span>
<span class="k">end</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="delete-an-object">
<h2>Delete an Object<a class="headerlink" href="#delete-an-object" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>This deletes the object <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">goodbye.txt</span></tt></p>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">S3Object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">delete</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'goodbye.txt'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="generate-object-download-urls-signed-and-unsigned">
<h2>Generate Object Download URLs (signed and unsigned)<a class="headerlink" href="#generate-object-download-urls-signed-and-unsigned" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>This generates an unsigned download URL for <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">hello.txt</span></tt>. This works
because we made <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">hello.txt</span></tt> public by setting the ACL above.
This then generates a signed download URL for <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">secret_plans.txt</span></tt> that
will work for 1 hour. Signed download URLs will work for the time
period even if the object is private (when the time period is up, the
URL will stop working).</p>
<div class="highlight-ruby"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="nb">puts</span> <span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">S3Object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">url_for</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="s1">'hello.txt'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="ss">:authenticated</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="kp">false</span>
<span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">puts</span> <span class="ss">AWS</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="ss">:S3</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="no">S3Object</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">url_for</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="s1">'secret_plans.txt'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s1">'my-new-bucket'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="ss">:expires_in</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="mi">60</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">60</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The output of this will look something like:</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>http://objects.dreamhost.com/my-bucket-name/hello.txt
http://objects.dreamhost.com/my-bucket-name/secret_plans.txt?Signature=XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX&amp;Expires=1316027075&amp;AWSAccessKeyId=XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>


          
}}
